item.description: Sunday, August 19, 1 - 3PM Visceral Murmurs" Exhibit Art Gallery On August 19 we welcome three artists from Worcester, Scott Erb, Brian Burris and Cynthia Woehrle. They will be on hand at the opening to give a collaborative talk about their art. The exhibition represents individual metaphors for the elemental beauty which can be found at Fruitlands Museum. The event is free with admission.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the art gallery!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Scotty's opening at the Fruitlands museum in Harvard Ma
